author: Anand Krishnamoorthy
title: Samsung Engineering Falls Most Since at Least 1997 on Share Sale
text:
Samsung Engineering Co. shares plunged the most on record in Seoul after the company announced plans to sell new shares in a rights offering to improve its finances.
The shares plunged 24% to 24,350 won in Seoul, the most since at least Jan. 3, 1997. The stock has fallen nearly 30 percent this year.
Samsung Engineering intends to sell shares for 1.2 trillion won ($1.05 billion) to existing shareholders, according to a stock exchange filing Thursday. The company plans to sell its headquarters building, which has a value of 350 billion won.
The engineering company posted a third-quarter operating loss of 1.51 trillion won.
